description: This header defines the PermissionsClient class, which provides a C++ wrapper around gRPC stub calls to a permission service used within the OttServices framework. The class offers methods for managing application permissions, including enumeration, retrieval, granting, revoking, setting, deleting, and authorization, among others. It encapsulates the details of gRPC communication and exposes a clean API for higher-level application code.

classes.name: PermissionsClient
classes.description: A wrapper class providing an interface to the gRPC permission service for managing app permissions and related operations.

methods.name: PermissionsClient
methods.description: Constructor to initialize the client with an endpoint and optional TLS usage or credentials.

methods.name: EnumeratePermissions
methods.description: Enumerates permissions for a specific application.

methods.name: Get
methods.description: Retrieves the ApplicationPermissions object for a given app.

methods.name: Grant
methods.description: Grants specified permissions and bundles to an app.

methods.name: Set
methods.description: Sets the full permissions object for an app, replacing existing data.

methods.name: Revoke
methods.description: Revokes specific permissions and bundles from an app.

methods.name: Authorize
methods.description: Authorizes a session token against permission filters.

methods.name: GetAllForApp
methods.description: Retrieves all permission entries for a specific app.

methods.name: GetAllAppKeys
methods.description: Retrieves all application keys known to the permission service.

methods.name: GetThorToken
methods.description: Acquires a Thor token for an app with specified parameters.

methods.name: RegisterPermissions
methods.description: Registers new permissions in the catalog.

methods.name: DeleteRegisteredPermission
methods.description: Deletes a permission from the catalog.

methods.name: Endpoint
methods.description: Returns the endpoint string used by the client.

methods.name: CreateChannel (static)
methods.description: Creates a gRPC channel with optional TLS.

methods.name: CreateChannel (static, overload)
methods.description: Creates a gRPC channel with explicitly provided credentials.
